file_content.text: That... that was brutal. But I owe you my thanks.
Got that right, girl. We're the heroes of the day.
So... what happens now?
Isn't there a bounty on this woman, Mako?
Aren't you a bounty?
Sure, but that's not something we're interested in. Right?
Credits are credits, Mako. We're gonna need the cash.
It's a paycheck.
For killing helpless targets? Braden... wouldn't have liked it.
All right, all right, you win.
Have it your way.
I'm just playing with you, Mako.
I wasn't serious.
Braden's gone, isn't he?
Times change. [Kill Albea]
I wouldn't do anything to upset you, Mako.
Not if you say no.
Interested, nothing. I'm positively intrigued.
Sure I am. [Kill Albea]
No, please!
That was disgusting. You're not the person I thought you were.
Can't afford to be sentimental.
Toughen up.
Maybe you're right... I don't know. It still feels wrong.
Shut up and do your job, Mako. Let me do mine.
Speak when you're spoken to.
You're next if you don't watch your mouth.
You want some?
You're lucky I need your stupid, insane... whatever to avenge Braden.
Take her body. We'll need it to turn in the bounty.
Come on, let's grab the sponsorship token and get out of here.
There's a clear path out. Take it.
I don't care.
There's a shuttle port in town--head there.
You need to get off Hutta.
Thank you so much. I'm sure I can find it.
Here, I've got an old hold-out blaster--just in case. Now get moving.
Thank you again. Both of you.
Stay back, I've got a... a... well, guess I don't have much of anything. Please, just tell me why I'm being held here?
I'm not really interested in you speaking, got it?
Be quiet!
Relax. We're not with Fa'athra's people.
Stay calm.
Nope, in fact, we just killed a whole bunch of 'em. Don't worry--we're not gonna kill you.
What do you think? This our Republic scientist?
Mako, ID this woman.
She fits the target description. Now, we just wait for Rarsk to show.
Short version, lady: There's a bounty hunter coming to take you to the Empire--where you'll probably die or at least be tortured.
Oh... my!
We want to kill this bounty hunter, so it's your lucky day. Just sit quietly and be bait-like.
Let's set up our ambush, Mako.
Get ready.
Be quiet, both of you. We need to set up an ambush.
No talking.
We'll try not to splatter any blood on you, ma'am.
It's going to be okay.
I'm not cut out for this. Please let me go. I'll do anything to--
What part of "sit quietly" didn't you understand? You're going to blow our--oh, great....
Hello, soft things. I see many Fa'athra servants are dead. Give me scientist female, and you will not join them.
All I want is to get into the Great Hunt. You can have the scientist.
Trade the token for the girl?
I've never killed a--what is he again, Mako?
He's funny!
Trandoshan. Rhymes with "dead meat."
Just give me Nem'ro's sponsorship token and walk away.
You want to live?
You are stupid, even for soft things. Rarsk will tear out your heart and feed it to a tiny rodent.
Bring it on, lizard man.
Try it.
I have to admit, I do love this job.
This is fun!
Why does it always come to violence?
I tried to be nice.
Scorekeeper, watch me!
